title: Sign up for the Guide newsletter: our free pop-culture email
text:
Sign up for the Guide newsletter: our free pop-culture email

Newsletters may contain information about charities, online ads, and content funded by outside parties. If you do not have an account, we will create a guest account for you on theguardian.com to send you this newsletter. You can complete full registration at any time. For more information about how we use your data see our Privacy Policy . We use Google reCaptcha to protect our website and the Google Privacy Policy and Terms of Service apply.
summary:
The best new music, film, TV, podcasts and more direct to your inbox, plus hidden gems and reader recommendations

From Billie Eilish to Billie Piper, Succession to Spiderman and everything in between, subscribe and get exclusive arts journalism direct to your inbox. Gwilym Mumford provides an irreverent look at the goings on in pop culture every Friday, pointing you in the direction of the hot new releases and the best journalism from around the world.

Explore all our newsletters: whether you love film, football, fashion or food, weâ€™ve got something for you
